Package ElectronicAssetTradingPlatform.Users

Class ITAdmin

java.lang.Object
ElectronicAssetTradingPlatform.Users.User
ElectronicAssetTradingPlatform.Users.ITAdmin
public class ITAdmin
extends User
ITAdmin class which extends the user class. This class is for the IT administration team giving them privileges, allowing them to do tasks such as creating and managing new organisational units, assets and the amount of credits for an organisational unit.

  • Nested Class Summary
